entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain with risk of a thunderstorm. Local amount 40 to 50 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Showers ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
